events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position and will begin review shortly.
The candidate's application has been categorized under Engineering after initial keyword and skill match analysis.
A recruiter specialized in software engineering has been assigned to manage and communicate with this candidate going forward.
Completed the initial screening call focusing on candidate's experience with development frameworks and DevOps tools.
The candidate responded enthusiastically, confirming availability and interest in proceeding with the technical interview.
Scheduled the virtual technical interview for the candidate on May 6th, focusing on coding skills and system design.
